ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Re: Anyone play PS2 EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: As much as I love the Star Wars Universe, I don t see me playing Galaxies.  I can t say why exactly, but even though I read SF but not fantasy, when it comes
ygData.messageBody:
As much as I love the Star Wars Universe, I don't see me playing
Galaxies. I can't say why exactly, but even though I read SF but
not fantasy, when it comes to role-playing, I guess I still prefer
the beautiful princess to the girl in the jumpsuit.

Need advice on new PCs? I love building them for less. It's an
act of creation. That moment when it boots for the first time is
breath-taking.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 4/4/03 at rosepetal_eq wrote:

____Well I gave up playing PC EQ along time ago. I miss somethings
____about
____that version, but have also fallen in love with some of the
features
____that the PS2 version offers. Slight differences, and some major
ones,
____but oh well. :)
____
____I am actually just waiting for the new game by Varient, Star
Wars
____Galaxies. Supposedly it will fix everything crappy about EQ,
and be
____one of the best gam,es for online. I cant wait to bash heads
with my
____female wookie. LOL
____
____Maybe when i get my new PC I will come back and play the PC
version
____of EQ again. I loved my necromancer, and my druid there. I was
____untouchable! HEHE
____
